version_description:
Added Secret Notes - Now take notes in the app
Updated for iOS 9.3.2

Bug Fixes
Videos are now merged in photos only
Bug Fixes
Bug Fixes - Should resolve issue of app crashes.
Bug Fix Release
Bug Fix Release

Fingerprint unlock
bug fixes
To access disguise screen -> slide your finger from left to right at top margin of the app

New : Free Cloud Backup
Price : Free for a limited time. So Download now.
Bug fixes

Bug fixes
Changed app name to "HIP"

To everyone facing the crash error - This error is the fake crash screen, swipe from left to right on the top edge of that screen to access the app. You can disable it later in the settings inside the app
Fixed crash on iPhone X
Updated to fix for iPhone X

Security update. After update kindly open app to recreate your pin.
Added : Two disguise screens.

Added 3 new disguises (Calculator, Joke of The Day, Currency Converter)
Fix: Disguise screen on iPhone X

Fix : Crash screen disguise for iPhoneX
Fix : Small Memory leak issue (Better performance)
Fix: Crash on iOS < 10.3 when changing app icon
Fix: Crash in calculator disguise screen.
Fix: Crash on iPad on pressing the share button

New: View cloud backup files
New: Advanced settings to speed up hiding

You can now Delete or Download individual files in your Cloud Backup
Better gif support
Video thumbnail bug fixed

Updated video player.
Fixed bugs in video player.
Performance Improvements
Updated for iOS 12

Fix: Editing notes
New: Hiding documents (PDF).

Fixed: Auto Logout when in photo browser
Fixed: Notes in escape vault
Performance Improvements

Fixed:
When pin code and escape code conflict with each other, the app will show a Done button at login screen to allow for proper logging in

Rare bug fixed
Fix: Crash when adding videos from gallery
Fix: Crash when backing up data in the cloud

Updated video player.
Fixed bugs in video player.

New:
iOS 13 Dark Mode (see Settings -> App Theme)

Fix:
Critical Bug fix in older iPhones
Cloud Backup and restore bug fixes

New:
iOS 13 Dark Mode (see Settings -> App Theme)

Fix:
FaceID fix
Critical Bug fix in older iPhones
Cloud Backup and restore bug fixes
Fixed iOS14 video issues
